content:
bvdh opened PR #379 from master to master:

I went over the specification and fixed a lot of editorial issues. No changes in any of the mandatory content are made.
These changes include:

  • various spelling and language updates
  • fixed missing/broken links
  • markdown format improvements, including heading level fixes
  • split off session discovery in separate section
  • subscription - changed the order of the messages
  • moved the new GET call from events to chapter 2
  • moved smart specific sections to launch scenario
  • split off FHIRcast event definition
  • split off FHIRcast scopes section
